aka: 杰夫·敦哈姆：怪兽出没注意

director.name: 曼尼·罗德里格斯 Manny Rodriguez

trans_title: 杰夫·敦哈姆：关注怪兽们
杰夫·敦哈姆：怪兽出没注意
introduction: Jeff Dunham's Minding the Monsters brings together your favorites-- Walter, Peanut, Bubba J, Jose Jalapeno... On a Steek!, and Achmed the Dead Terrorist as you've never seen them before! Enter the ultimate haunted house where Walter transforms into something grumpier than he already is! Watch Bubba J rise from the dead! Meet Peanut's alter ego, The Purple Avenger of the Night, and his spicy sidekick! And witness Achmed literally dressed to kill in an outfit that would terrify the most terrifying terrorist!
chinese_title: 杰夫·敦哈姆：关注怪兽们
